ygData.subject: UNSUB-FUCKING-SCRIBE
ygData.msgSnippet: Everything up to lvl 12 is super easy, for lvl 12 to 13 i stayed in misty thicket killing sand scarabs, strong giant spiders, strong giant wasp and young
ygData.messageBody:
Everything up to lvl 12 is super easy, for lvl 12 to 13 i stayed in misty
thicket killing sand scarabs, strong giant spiders, strong giant wasp and
young kodiaks, lvl 13 to 14 i did in south ro, this zone is awesome, there
is a dune towards the oasis zone point where you can stand and the monster
just run away, so you step out, bait them back, step back cast and repeat to
take on yellow mummies and dune terantulas, cheesy but effective. I did
this with my druid only doing 36 a hit, a wizard doing 78 would be much more
effective. After lvl 14 go to oasis and group, simple as that, at lvl 18
your options expand to high hold for orc or gnoll groups, permafrost if
you're feeling brave, and parts of unrest. GET ME OFF OF THIS FUCKING LIST
